"Shirase": "Repairing machines is a really quite a stubbornly delicate process, you know."
"Even when there's just a little bit left to do, that \"little bit\" could go either way..."
"Oh, me? I'm Shirase. I'm in charge of machine maintenance and repair around here."
"I was just about to continue working on a broken robot, actually."
"But, well, I ran into a snag..."
"I'm missing some parts, so I was looking around for something that I might be able to use..."
"You wouldn't happen to have anything that could help, would you?"
"...Yeah, I figured. I can't just ask out of the blue like that..."
"I really want to fix this robot."
"Do you have any Photon Chunks?"
"Give 10 Photon Chunks"
"Return"
"Thank you so much! I can fix the robot with this!"
"It seems these robots around here have been running since back when Central City was centered in Kvaris."
"So, yeah, some of them end up falling into disrepair like this guy."
"I'm not sure when that'll happen to these vendorbots, so I just want to make sure I'll be ready when they need maintenance."
"I mean, the little guys are working around the clock, so I figure it's the least I can do for them."
"Well, I'm gonna fix this guy up with those Photon Chunks. This should be enough..."
"Just you wait and see!"
"...Ah, I think I'm going to need a bit more... I'm so sorry to impose on you like this..."
"Ah, alright... Well, I'll be here, so whenever you can."
"Thanks again so much for those Photon Chunks."
"It's just... The repairs aren't quite done yet, you see."
"The more I look, the more I keep finding other areas that need tending to."
"If you don't mind, could I ask you you help me out again?"
"Y-Yeah, no, I totally understand. It's was pretty idealistic of me to assume, given the circumstances..."
"I haven't been able to fix the robot yet, but I don't intend on giving up."
"Do you have any Photon Quartz?"
"Give 10 Photon Quartz"
"Return"
"Thank you so much once again! Now I'll finally be able to repair this robot."
"This time, for sure. This robot will be repaired, mark my words!"
"It seems like the previous ARKS of Kvaris had been using these robots, but..."
"I've been finding data that indicates they've been running for much longer than even that."
"So I figure, if I can repair these robots, maybe I'll learn about some long lost technology, you know?"
"I get all giddy thinking I could be one step closer to uncovering some mysterious technology!"
"Anyways, I'm going to get started on these repairs."
"This could take some time, but I should be done by the time you take care of some of your own errands."
"I'll let you know when repairs are done, okay?"
"...Ah, I think I'm going to need a bit more... I'm so sorry to impose on you like this..."
"Ah, alright... Well, I'll be here, so whenever you can."
"Look, I was able to get it to work again!"
"I can't thank you enough for your help."
"If it weren't for you, who knows how many days or weeks it would have taken to get those materials."
"Hehe... It's cute, isn't it? I mean, okay, I might have grown a little attached, but still."
"There's a few bolts that need tightening here and there, but it's nothing I can't handle."
"Someday, I hope to be able to rebuild these little guys from scratch."
"I think learning more about this technology could really help improve our way of life."
"I hope you treat the vendorbots with just as much care as you showed this little fella, okay?"
"Thanks again!"
"I want to learn more about this technology, so I can put it to good use."
"I hope you treat the vendorbots with just as much care as you showed this little fella, okay?"
"This time, I'm certain I'll have it repaired."
"When I'm done, I'll be sure to contact you."
"Look, I was able to get it to work again!"
"I hope you treat the vendorbots with just as much care as you showed to this little fella, okay?"
"I want to learn more about this technology and use it to improve our way of life."
